# Movie Recommendation System 
This is a Movie Recommendation System built using collaborative filtering techniques. The app is deployed using Streamlit and can be accessed through the link provided below.
![Image](https://github.com/Vedant326/Movie-Recommendation-System/blob/main/ss.png)


## Features

- Provides personalized movie recommendations based on user ratings.
- Utilizes collaborative filtering to recommend movies similar to those you have liked.
- Simple and intuitive interface built with Streamlit.

## How to Run Locally

1. Clone this repository:
   ```sh
   git clone https://github.com/yourusername/movierecommendation.git

#notebook
! (https://colab.research.google.com/#fileId=https%3A//storage.googleapis.com/kaggle-colab-exported-notebooks/movie-recommender-system-1-953f755a-39fd-489d-9130-99eea5c8f343.ipynb%3FX-Goog-Algorithm%3DGOOG4-RSA-SHA256%26X-Goog-Credential%3Dgcp-kaggle-com%2540kaggle-161607.iam.gserviceaccount.com/20240723/auto/storage/goog4_request%26X-Goog-Date%3D20240723T075049Z%26X-Goog-Expires%3D259200%26X-Goog-SignedHeaders%3Dhost%26X-Goog-Signature%)


## Run the Streamlit app
```sh
  streamlit run app.py
